::Killer/Zardus::

Killer opens his eyes, seeing Zardus walking past. He jumps at the alliance 
leader, screaming like a maniac. A swift kick from Zardus sends him flying 
backwards into the wall of the Ark.

Zardus recieves the transmission from Punch. "Ah, good," he replies, 
"Although the Maximals and Predacons are allies for now," he pauses to duck 
under Killer as the pred attacks him again, "If you would join the rest of us 
at the battle, it would be apreciated," he says into his comm-link as he 
swings his sword at Killer.
